message.body: You comin to milcreek tonight?
Wasn't going to - exhausted. U there?
Ugh, ya but I'm leaving, it's awful. St pattys = worst
Only a good holiday if ur watching a pub crawl from a safe distance. Have a good trip/ home. :)
Haha, thx
I'll be there. I'll be recovering from pretending to be a cheerleader, but I'll be there. ;)
Tks!
Dumpster alert: clarion and kater (near 13th and south) has a ton of ply scrap (that's a little dirty) if u need it
Oooo, yea, thx.... Not sure I'll get to it, but will try! Thanks
Judes said you might be out an about, I'm at the Piaf cabaret if you were thinking about comin!
Ai, or maybe not, it's sold out, wah
Wha? Was just at perch, with a few ppl and a giant blast from the past
Where u at? I think I'm supposed to go take some shit ddown at the schubin tonite, but I might bail.....
When is J's band going on tonite?
Later I think...11ish? Hope ta see ya!
So, I'm gonna pretend you just said 10:30, cause Judith, Gina, and I are all hoping to drop by - but gina and I think time is relative... :) cu soon!
Haha, sweet, see you lovely ladies soon!
Hey; cutting it close. Left Martino to fend for herself. Anything we shld know abt entrance/where to stand?
Penn xmas = tmrw and wed? New traffic patterns on penn's campus those days, at least. Thoughts?
I would love a little Christmas after work tomorrow....
Hey, is there anything fun going on around town tonite? U always seem to have a feel for the best random stuff around.
Hm, my finger seems to only be on the napping pulse right now...I'll letcha know if I hear of somethin!
Fancy that - I just got off that beat! Enjoy.
Sure. I'll get bak to u tmrw am
Enjoy the PDF!
Dude, u'd better get ur ass over here. I'm defending the last bean burger against the onslaughts of Jim AND Kerri. Apparently the beef wasn't enuf for them...
Nope, let'm eat...I'm trapped :-(
No ur not!!!! Come here instead!!!!
Trapped I say!!'. I want to come!!
Ok, fine, i'(l forgive you this time. Ps-I txted ur old number by accident. I'd fwd u the txt I got bak, but it was over 550 characters, and it was hilarious
Agh, so sorry! Please give Judith my apologies and a hug for you both!
Of course, sweetheart. Kate and I are reading together Tuesday, fyi. Yay!!!
Yay, will be calling to do schedules in Tuesday too!
Didn't have time to leave keys. Call and or txt to get them from the new coop building if u get there before 210
Doubtful, but will letcha know!
For some reason, I wanted to type "goddamnit, you whore, call me" but then I realized that I'd been talking to Mike waaaay too much
Sorry, just got the car, so obviously can't get there by 2:10, sorry :-(
Is cool. Jim doesn't want me to leave keys outside. Can I meet you here, or out and about somewhere? (Jim and I are going to Bob's soonish, if ppl are s
till there)
Maybe we can get them at bobs?
Sure! Ru going to bobs now?
Hehe. It looks like "boobs"
:) Don't thank me until i actually get u the lumber, and u see If u can use it. Sorry things got complicated; my brain is slow today.
Hi. I just sent you an email with pictures of the lumber, and of other items that might prove useful. Now that u have a better idea of what supplies I'
ve got, can you b more specific abt what ud like me to bring tmrw?
Sorry 'bout all the confusion....don't worry about bringing it if yr planning on biking, I'll be out in w phila again with a vehicle sometime soon, so no need to trouble yrself!
It's not any trouble, I just figured u might have specs, or something, so I didn't bring u a ton of 2'5" pieces if u don't need anything smaller than 2'6
" and that sort of thing. U can also use my car whenevs is convenient. I'm free Sunday to do car/lumber stuff, if u don't have a cut list for me today
I think I have *most* of the lumber I need now....might need more bracing for the platform, but not sure yet. But definitely the metal rolly and shelf...
Let's return this convo to gmail. Texts are a pain in the ass
YES
Still 10 out. But I assembled a bag of Margharita supplies while waiting for my script tonprint, so maybe that helps a little?
Is k there yet?
Awesome
PS omg I've been sober pretty much all week. WTF?!?!?!
Ok, I need 6 2x4's 2 @ 4ft & 4 @ 5ft
No dice there. Sorry. What time ru coming over to p/u the other stuff, or shld I just bring it to rehearsal?

If you were planning on driving and can fit the shelf and cart, great. If not, I'll come by sometime in the week, since I want to go to 2nd mile in the same trip, and I can look at the other stuff then! Rehearsal at 4, if that works for ya
I'll see u at four for sure. U got my txt that I don't have any 2x4s longer than 2.5 ft, right?
Gotcha.
Dude, apparently I can't handle a night off. I'm fuckin bored. You feel like crusin the town, or something?
Not related: have 8 2.5 inch casters w/brakes and 4 2.5 inch casters w/out brakes. Lmk if u want em
Ack, sorry, I've been trying to learn all of calc III in an hour...and am now drunk. But tomorrow?...!
I've been making fresh mojitos all night, and was plastered for a while, until I sobered up to go to home despot. Tmrw sounds good!! Sometime after 730
Hi! R we still on for tonite? I have ingredients for fresh mojitos/...

Maybe I have to go to a show at l'etage around nine and I have to meet with Mary before then so maybe if I have some time in between or after then I'm sorry I forgot about the show. I'll call you when I'm back
S'all good. Sux to b u, tho. I'm filling a wading pool with water and ice, and eating a vodka ice pop
Agh, that is what I want to doooooo (pool and vodka pop!)
Be jealous. Be very jealous
'spanx!
(about the pool)
Do I need a van or truck for the shelf and stuff, or will a car work?
Can you get like a hatchback? Or a Honda element? That should be aboutthe right size. The shelves come apart, but the cart doesn't. When ru coming by?
Yea, I can do that. Sometime next week, we can work it out at rehearsal
Sounds great cu at 6
Yea, we did say 6 right? I had 5 written somewhere but I thought 6 was right. Sigh. Scheduling=not my strong suit
5 was when Kate cld get there on an ideal day, I think. 6 is what I wrote down, and what melody sent out ps i love having a stage manager
Yea holy shit it's so awesome. Cool, c ya at 6!
Hi! When ru block-partying? I drank too much on the pirate ship last night, and haven't made my way over yet.
Haha, just now...43 and osage!
Hi! Marinating tofu, and picking fresh veggies from the garden. U should come over!
(ps sry I bolted. I got hangry)
Where's yr car? J is going to the space and can check on it
Oh, sweet! Just slightly north of tranny, on the east side of front street. He's awesome and is going to save me a headache tomorrow
No prob!
Still have a car, and all the stuff in it!!!
Yay!
Cu at quarter of
K
Stuck in traffic, which is pushing everything back about a half hour. Do u want me to meet u there, or shall we call it a wash?
You still have next weekend open?
Yea. Judith is in town, so I'd rather not rehearse more than 5 hrs in a day, if possible
(and I mean that just the way i said it. No like crazy "reading sarah's mind and not scheduling rehearsal at all" kind of way. Cause rehearsals under 5
hours are t
*t
Fuck!!totally awesome
Fuck my iPhone
No prob! Kate got the weekend back, you'll have sat off, 4 hrs on fri and 3 on sun if that's ok?
Sounds great! When on fri?
...and Sunday, obv
Jesus that freaked my phone out. 4-8 fri, 1-4 sun, email headed out now
Glad you made it home!
Not home yet. Went for drinks w/Martino, then avoided karaoke and plan to make out with my a/c. The Schuylkill can fuck itself.
Thanks!
U still building tonite?
Prob a little later than expected, but yea! Wanna come?
60% likelihood of me showing up. That accurate enuf of an answer?
Yup :-). I'm thinking 6-8
Cool. Ps do u want to re- center the wood for the science bench, or do u want me to rout the edges?
Pps what is more important: napping, or drinking mojitos while cleaning the bathroom?
Whatever inspires you to come help me build more (mojitos?). And fuck that bench, I'm duct taping it and painting over it
Dude I can fix it in 10 minutes!!
Ok, maybe 15 real-people minutes
Might not be possible now, we fucked around with it last night...but yr welcome to try....
Fudge. Ok, i'll try for a few min, and then probably give up
If I made a large quantity of mojitos, wld u like one or two at tranny?
Yessssss, I am headed there in 10, and will leave around 7:30 for this dumb boat show if you wanna come
Boat show? Not leslie's going away party, right?
No, puppettyranny show and other performances, $10
*thinks* prob not. Rather make puppets.
Yea...
I suppose having a "helper with a limits schedule" wldnt get u out of ur obligation?
Agh! I have to go to the show, you can come now and leave with me, or stay and leave when you want, or come when I get done (9/10ish)
Or not come cuz of all the silly
Thanks and sorry for the dum schedule
My iPhone can suk my dick.
I'm on my way there, w/alcohol. Yay!
Sry. Slept until like 15 min ago. On the plus side u saved me from myself, and my penchant for drama, so bonus points for you!!!
Trash picked u a desk!!! Hope it works
Yay! You > best. Should I Carshare to get it?
Hey. Fri=still fine. Can't build this wknd cause Judith is in town
Nooooooooooooooo....problem. Yr souper
Yr super-er. I can't find my porn on my time machine backup!!!!!! Aaaahhhh!!!!
Thank god for the Internet!
I got it off the Internet!! It was really good feminist lesbian stuff (you kno, the kind u don't want to vomit after watching). And I can't find it. :(
Broke a spoke. I'll b 5 late
K, good luck
Surprise!!!! 5 min late
Lies! 3 min early!! I downstairs. I have food for you
Yr food, so good. Thank you so much again!
Can you bring sewing machine?
Yes. Two questions: is it ok that I keep bringing various other alcoholic beverages to rehearsal? And if I was to make a trip to delaware for some tax-
free alcohol in the near future, would u want me to get u anything?
Mmmm, yes that's a.o.k., and possibly!
Going to b 5 late for real
No prob
And can you come at 3 on Sunday? No rob rehearsal now. No prob if no!
3 shld b pm
Shit. *ok
Query: did the person you were talking to abt Wellbutrin for Nora ever come through?
I'm running out, and I'm still not on speaking terms with a psychiatrist
Call off the hounds! I have success! Ps what is Nora lookin for again?
Yay! Um, wellbutrin and adderall
Brief nap commences. When I wake up, I'm making stir fry tofu. Want some?
Zomg, yessss, thanks!!!
Does this mean you've been at the space this whole time??
Dude
(because I was about to confusedly give up on hearing from you and start an hour long project)
You are super dumb.
Agh, yes, my bad, I r dumb
I'll leave soon. Tpth. I'm gonna get me a m
*darker beer. Anybody else there? Nora?
Sorry...agh...thought I told you but apparently I was just thinking about food. No one else here
Tee hee. Np. U want a fancy beer, too? Ooo beer fairy!!!
Agh, you are so gooooodddddd yes thank you!
Wanna tell me a little abt what you want me to get?
And why doesn't my iPhone tell me when I get txts anymore?!?!fuck this noise!!!
Dark is fine, I ain't t picky
?? Let's smash it, that'll teach it!
Touch my iPhone, and I will maul you
Just sayin
Hahahah
...hot?
See u in 45 u lunatic
Going thru no libs on sat pm = worst idea ever
Yea, there's some crazy block party thing going on now too. I hide inside with giant insects.
You leave staples and staple gun over here. And awesome drill. And paddle bits. For these things, I ruv you. Thanks!
Anything for ur less-than-three. ;) PS- they just opened a bunch of exam dates, including a few after the run of the show, and r looking for SPs that a
re available. PS- u can't leave next fall. I like you too much. :(
Awesome thanks! Awwwr....we'll see, it's still a long way off....
Naw, you're a wanderer; i just forsee missing u is all. :) it's gross outside
Rehearsal 5-7 now for so Kate may have short hair
:( but I love her hair!!! Question: what are the two palatable flavors of emergen-c?
Pom/cran and super orange!
Yayay!! (getting a cold...or something??) ps when will u b at the space today?
I have to go home and print scripts and then i'll be there...around 4:30? If you wanna come then and work beginning mono? Don't be sick!!
...I'm going to presume autocorrect just substituted "mono" for something, but I have no idea what that wld b. I think a little vit c and netti pot will fix it
Monologue! Yay vitamins and netti
I thought u were rewritting the monologue, so I stopped working on it? Discuss when I get there?
Ps- we are not sold out for openin night he box office had a technical glitch :(
Yeah, jk, I'll get there in time for the regular rehearsal
Ok!
Where do I say you're from (writing mainline publications)
?. Sorry. Late. It's late, I mean
Hi bful I'm going to stop at tjs for a snack need anything?
Brawr, thx, I have some fruit tho!
I just sent u three emails abt stuff u might want that I found at my parents house. Lmk if u do
Hi! Will u b at the space in 15 that i can come nap?
Ai! I' m at dos, but can meet you if you wanna nap now, srry
Dont wry abt it cu at 6
Judith says: "wait, so he (Corey) is a talented, nice, attractive musician, who is dating a girl who doesn't like that he's a musician?! You should just
take her out back and shoot her."
Tell Judith I LOVE her
Happpppy birthdaaaaaay! Sorry I can't make it to dahlakkkkkkk....have a splendid time!
Kate can't make tomorrow so see ya Saturday!
Ru still building tmrw?
Yup, after work
Kewl. Ps if u have any leftover vinyl tubing of any sort, I'd love to buy/steal it from u
I might have some lying around and yr welcome to it!
Thanks lmk when ur heading to the space
Headed there straight after work
K
Hi. Melody's rehearsal report for rehearsal #3 indicates that I have rehearsal today and tomorrow...but I will not be at either?
Hollah if u want helpbuilding shit
No rehearsal for you tomorrow. I ambuilding painting tonight if you wanna stop by, and party tomorrow at 5
Ooohhh ok. Somehow g
*got w/a straightedge dude, so unlikely well bee by
Oh god remind me nevr to drink or smoke again
Haha.....no no!, I want to keep receiving nonsensical texts!
Dude, I woke up this morning and stumbled downstairs. I made myself coffee, ate breakfast, and made my way back upstairs, when Matt (the guy I was hangi
ng out with until 3 AM, who crashed out on my futon) stumbles out of his room and asks to borrow a pair of shorts. He's in distressed jeans that hang ju
st right on his toned, shirtless frame, and, once again, I cursed the universe for making me gay.
Hi! Shld I still come by, or is the party over?
Just started!
Come!
By "big girl panties" I meant that I realized I wanted emotional intimacy, but I was substituting in physical intimacy, which wasn't going to get me anyw
here by the end of he night, primarily b/c the person I wanted was Judith. That was what I was trying to convey. Hugs! Thx for the fun!
Aw. It's like you ruvvv her or somethin :-)yay thx fer coming!
See u tmrw. :)
....elizabitch just told me i can't have a cup of water, with a lid, in my room. This will not stand.
What?? the SP Handbook (revised in 2008 and readily available in the commons,) section 7.4, does not restrict the consumption of water in areas outside
the commons. Any revisions should be clearly communicated to the SP community. If we are required to have spill-proof containers (ie containers with scr
ew-on tops) then that should also be communicated to SPs, but could be a legitimate ruling. The end.
You are so awesome
PS- the February 2010 revision is identical. Are you going to make my day and say something?!?!
I'd bring u lunch on Saturday.....
Haha....you are unbelievable. In the best way. I got Amy to look into it and....gah, too long. I hate the country club.
Lmk how it works out. I like to hold a grudge. ;)
We can have water in a cup w a lid in the room, but can't store it outside or in the drawer unless it's empty. Gah. Because obviously, we are 5 years old
...my vindictive self wants to know: was elizabitch informed?? >;)
Yessssssssomg I hate her pinchy face so
Hey, did u just feel that shaking? What was it??
Yeah. I think I'm making post-non-apocalyptic drinks at my house. Interested?
'twas an earthquake...bit I didn't feel it!!
Can't (of course). Thanks tho!
Hi! What size PVC shld I pick up?
Thx
8.5 inch clamp light?
Options=5.5, 8.5, and 10.5
Hi. I'm downstairs.
Damnit, can't get drinks after, have to meet Mel and show her the space. Could do drinks/thrift store after that? 4:15 in south Philly?
Tpth! No prob. Will u b at tranny today? I meant to p/u my tools yesterday, but got distracted. I planned a place to store all my flat stock in the bsmt!!
And that way I can get my clothes to show u
Cool, I'll head to tranny shortly after circle...rehearsal 8-10
Think I can do 17 shows in 10 days, not including our performances? 8) we shld talk schedules
(tonight, I mean)

Of course! So, want me to call you when I leave circle? Can I give you yr money later tonight? Was planning on hitting the ATM on the way to drinks...but I can run there and meetcha quick like after work as well
If you come to tranny before 7 we can go look at clothes too
I don't need the cash right away. Do u want to meet at circle with my car? I can put it in the back seat, and we can go straight to clothes shopping. I
don't mind getting to Tranny close to 8 and just grabbing my stuff and going. I know what my pants and shirts look like, and what shoes I have. It will
kinda depend on what u think abt what I have. Ponder good places to get heels-even if it isn't a thrift shop
It=bike
Cool, sounds good! I'm headed there right after work, shouldn't be there more than half an hour
Cool. And hey, what's with the last rehearsal report? Is melody not going to be at the opening?
Nope. We hates it we do
Delayed briefly. Will tell details upon arrival
K
Is picking u up at 415 still good?
Prolly...mel's not here yet tho
K. I won't rush then, and will take quick pics of clothes. Need anything on he way? Like a towel? ;)
Leaving now. U want me to meet u at a store, or is circle still fine?
I am still at circle
Hey. Parked in front of ur bike. Finishing up a phone call. Lmk when u want to head out
Omg I'm there now. This place is awesome!!
K, let's meet in the thrift store in the basement in 15
Respond whenever: Judith is free 11 (or earlier, if need be) until mid afternoon. Gwen is free 4-8, but we're rehearsing then so her help wldnt b useful,
wld it?
Judes, yes! Gwen no. You are such a sport. We may have to canoe everything over, but by gum it will happen!
Monday should be fine. I seriously thought u wanted to do load in during a hurricane, which was why I was concerned "for your sanity"
PS-my neighbor is giving away: eggplants, heads of lettuce, cucumbers, and green peppers. Want any of he above?
You should still prolly be concerned for my sanity :-). Yea, I'd love any and all o those, thx!
Sanity= ability to have a relative grasp what can and cannot be accomplished in a particular span of time, under a given set of circumstances. I think ne
ither u nor I ever had what laymen would consider "sanity"
Nope
Given that I'm currently covered in quickcrete and expanding foam, I'd agree with u there. :)
Heh. No way a size 2 is fittin over yr tatas, right?
Ha! No,
Autocorrect changed "orzo" to "oral," causing me to inadvertently ask Kate and Chris if they wanted to come over for lamb and oral... FML
Can we look at costumes at the end of the run today? Jim has the car, with all the skirts and shoes, and if we wait until the end of rehearsal, Judith c
an pick me up, and bring all the costume pieces at once
K
Lies. Have car and costumes. Cu soon
I'm willing to pick kate and chris (and john wilder?) up at 11:45, and then drive to Tranny. Some people are saying it isn't that bad, and some people ar
e flipping out. Can people stay later to rehearse? Plus, rob seemed particularly reticent to leave his house, so whoever calls him may have to assuage
his fears
He's fine noon to 4. Great, i'l be in touch about folks, but Lesley and rob are only confirmed now. Thanks!
Hi. I told Kate to call you with her question about rehearsals. Did she?
No
FML. Ok, I'll txt u if u need to give her a call. Otherwise ignore these texts
Is the curtain for the whole preview tonight at 8, or is that when we go on? If we don't go on at 8, do u know when we're supposed to go on?
(I got an audition offer, and would like to respond quickly)
(which is why I'm pestering you about it)
We go on at 8
Cutting it close. Cu when I get there.
5 min out. Sry
Nobprob
Hi. Leaving for audition unless u need amything else from me?
Nope, thx!!
Ty!! That was awesome... Except for the moment I realized I didn't have any pants for my backstage cross from usr to usl. Awesome
Presuming dressy ballet flats will not suffice?
S ok. Sending u pics of shirts that might go under suit. Any work?
Er...would prefer heels, sorry...
Off white yes, no on others
Yes!! (is it "the one")
It looks to be
YE-fucking-S!!!!!!!
Now, shoes...
Ughk
Went into Macy's, and cldnt even justify buying the shoes on the sale rack, when I knew, with some diligence, I cld get waaaay cheaper shit at thrift stores
...what spare time?
Yes, true. I will keep thrift hunting in spare tine
...yea....god, I hate doing lights. Haaaaate
Doing Lights sucks ass... I'll try to suck less tmrw, I just get nervous that I'm fucking up, and start thinking abt all the notes, and then realize I ha
ve to act, and then realize I'm not saying the lines right, and the cycle begins all over again. Crazy actor.
You are not allowed to be nuts right now, only Mel and I are
Do you have repach's number?
U shld have it now
Thx!
Still working on shoes
K
All emails are in ur box. Call me to talk shoes. Notbuying anything tonite
Whale optics looks good, but it's rough, still. Really really rough. So I'm takin the second act in at perch pub
Judih is txting me when its the second intermission
Aw. That's too bad. Enjoy the lesbians!
No lesbians tonite. Apparently there are "off" nights when the bar is unpopulated
I'm having trouble finding tonight's call time, because I'm spastic. Is it 5:30?
6, I think? Not sure it was ever set, sorry
May/may not see u at LotF. Is it still in Clark park, or is there a rain location?
Dunno, gonna call and find out
LoTF cancelled
Meet for pre metal drink? Mindy n I r going to silk city
Can't go quite that far-have to finish a project here. Metal is at 930, right? If u guys decide to get a second drink somewhere closer to st Stephens, hollah!
K!
Making out of state liquor run. Need anything?
Still stocked from mine, thanks!
U going to green fairy tonite? I'm driving. Anybody else going that u kno of needs a ride?
I'm in! Where/when to meet? I'll see if mindy wants to go
7 pm. Ur place? Lmk sooner rather than later abt mindy cause otherwise I'd give Martino a ride
Can i offer Martino a ride either way?
Give Martino a ride, mindy is going to whale
I'm telling Gina 645, since she's never ready on time. I'll prob b at ur place a little later.
And 7, my place is poifect!
Ok!
Hi! Ok now, the last part is Gina's fault. Cu in 5
K
Or so. We're fine for time, I built in extra time, b/c g and I r idiots
Heh. Just let me know when yr here
Come to work
Why are the ushers sitting next to me? How can I have my friend like this????
My review: 25 minutes were well written and worth watching. The other 75 were more disappointing than dropping a triple scoop of ice cream on the ground.
You could have written something better drunk and high, AND you would have known not to use 30 minutes of it
I love you :-)
Are you driving today?
Judith has the car, so no
Kewl, thx
Do you still have the grocery bag? Can't find it
Nm, sorry!
S ok. Sry to confuse u.
Sorry I'm dum...
Tonight. What's up?
Are you working tonight or tomorrow?
Np
Can you grab some more blue gloves? I'm about to ruin yours fixing quent. Thanks!
Hey. U goin to fringe bar? I thought I'd go to baby blues tonite, but I'd join u if somethig fun was going on
Noooo, I is tired. Have fun!
Damnit, didn't clean out my drawers. Can you bring all that stuff to circle? Sorry...thanks...room 7...
Got it!
Thanks!
....aaaannnnd locked my keys in my car. A "kind" man tried to help me break into my car. Failed
Oh no!!!! Didja cab home?
Yup. :sigh: so much for an early evening
If you are able, bring some cushions tonight! Tryinta put folks on the floor up front.
Might also b good for anybody who has stools to bring em?
To sit in the bak? Just an idea
Yess, plz bring if you can!
Hi! I'm seeing elephant room, and then I want to play! What ru up to this evening?
Was supposed to see elephant, but now no. Prolly n Philly Aisha rockaway party, or w Philly? Will letcha know!
Please, do lmk. Wherever u go, a good time tends to follow...
Shld my drunky drunk ass join u anywhere?
Yo, ru gonna b at tranny anytime today or tmrw?
J will def be there tomorrow and I may as well...evening work for you?
Jeremy said he'd be there at like 5 tonite, so ima stop by. Can I borrow ur gorilla glue?
Um, I think it's all dried out, but if it's not (and you can find it...), sure! All yr stuff should be together
Vaginas should not have pop tarts coming out of them; vaginas should have Godiva chocolate bars coming out of them!!
(referencing john's vagina puppet, of course)
....how about both?
And could you possibly swing by here (if in car) on way there? I have much beer, and plan to leave around 8:15?
Isn't party at 9?
Yes, but I need to pick up microscopes at tranny and a few other things...if you can't, is fine!
:(. Not leaving here until 830-haven't made food yet!
No worries!
Y u no invite charnee to cast party?!?!?!
I had a hard time remembering everyone in the cast to invite, totes didn't think to invite the helpers that weren't on crew, my bad
Hey bful. Feel better. I'm next door if I can help?
Hey. U got any leftover liquor bottles? I have a project that requires liquor bottles smaller than a handle, and I don't have any more empty ones
None, but I'll save any new ones!
I'll letcha know when I head to tranny today and meetcha there!
Hott. I'm working till 3
This is only gonna take me five more mins and then I'm to tranny
Yes. J has the car, so I'm borrowin jim's
Headed out now
Will take 15 to get over n
Ready to meet? I'm about to get on the el
Cool, c ya there
Did u leave? If so, don't go before I give u food
Or rather, if u havent left, make sure u get food from me. ;)
Ah. I am leaving. Where are you?
Haha, and I totes did not get what you meant by "food" until I got home and was all "Sarah...what....the....". But ha, sorry, and thanks for bringing! And have fun at PDF! Too much fun!
Dante's inferno is here
(at 3700) if u were looking for it
Thx!
Hey, you know stuff; question: what is the fun-est shit that is going on tonight? I kinda forgot to pay attention, and all the sudden it's Halloween
Bummer (abt u bein in for the night). U buildin on Monday? I'm free all day
